description: KODU files enable games created in the Kodu visual development environment to be saved and played. While the games (*.kodu files) can be shared with other users, they can only be run with the Kodu software.

Kodu runs on both Microsoft Windows and the Xbox game console. Users can develop games on both platforms using the Kodu Game Lab software. For Windows, Kodu Game Lab requires both the .NET Framework and the Microsoft XNA Framework to be installed.
